metadata.title: ESSEX GLAM Womens Lace Up Boots Chunky Sole Military Combat Mid Calf Booties
features: Shaft measures approximately 6 Inches from arch
Step Out In Style In Our Chunky Lace Up Combat Ankle Boots!
Heel Height 5 CM / 2 Inches | Shaft Height 15.3 CM / 6 Inches
Made With All High Quality Materials
This style is labelled with UK/EU size but this will be equivalent to the US size ordered. E.G US5/UK3, US6/UK4, US7/UK5, US8/UK6, US9/UK7, US10/UK8, US11/UK9
description: - Zip & Lace Up Fastening  - Cleated Sole  - Heel Height 5 CM / 2 Inches - Platform Height 1.4 CM / 0.6 Inches - Shaft Height 15.3 CM / 6 Inches - Ankle Circumference 27.5 CM / 10.8 Inches - Made with High Quality Synthetic Materials  - Ideal for Casual, Everyday, Day Time & Party - All Measurements Are Approx. Based On A UK Size 4 / EU Size 37. Please Note That Measurements Above May Vary By Size
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Item model number": "KF-3", "Department": "womens", "Date First Available": "November 13, 2018", "Manufacturer": "ESSEX GLAM"}
